dr.evomodel.operators
Class RateSampleOperator

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.operators.SimpleMCMCOperator
      dr.evomodel.operators.RateSampleOperator
All Implemented Interfaces:
MCMCOperator
public class RateSampleOperator
extends SimpleMCMCOperator

A special operator for sampling rates in a subtree according to a RateEvolutionLikelihood such as the autocorrelated clock model

Author:
Michael Defoin Platel
